name: Milepost Ventures
overview: Milepost Ventures, previously Viridian Capital, is a venture capital firm specializing in investments in information technology, healthcare and life science companies founded or run by women entrepreneurs or that distribute primarily to women for investment. They prefer to invest in the western part of the United States but will invest nationally. It invests between $100,000 and $1 million in a first funding round and invests up to $2 million over the investment life cycle of a portfolio company. Milepost Ventures is based in San Francisco, California.

funding_round.source_description: RAVEN BIOTECHNOLOGIES INC. RAISES $48.3 MILLION IN SERIES D FINANCING
